Enum Class Region

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Enum<Region>
com.github.cowwoc.digitalocean.resource.Region
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Region>, Constable
public enum Region extends Enum<Region>
A geographical region that contains one or more datacenters.

    • getZones

      public Set<Zone> getZones(DigitalOceanClient client) throws IOException, InterruptedException, TimeoutException
      Returns the zones in this region that are available for creating Droplets.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      Returns:
      an empty set if no match is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • getZones

      public Set<Zone> getZones(DigitalOceanClient client, boolean canCreateDroplets) throws IOException, InterruptedException, TimeoutException
      Returns the zones in this region.
      Parameters:
      client - the client configuration
      canCreateDroplets - true if the returned types must be able to create Droplets
      Returns:
      an empty set if no match is found
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any of the arguments are null
      IllegalStateException - if the client is closed
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs. These errors are typically transient, and retrying the request may resolve the issue.
      TimeoutException - if the request times out before receiving a response. This might indicate network latency or server overload.
      InterruptedException - if the thread is interrupted while waiting for a response. This can happen due to shutdown signals.

    • contains

      public boolean contains(Zone zone)
      Determines if a region contains a zone.
      Parameters:
      zone - the zone
      Returns:
      true if the region contains the zone
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if zone is null
